tips.title: Tips
tips.content: You can perform other tasks but on the other tab.

tips.title: For Mobile Search
tips.content:
Step 1: press ctrl + shift + I
Step 2: Click on responsive
Step 3: Select any mobile device
Step 4: Just start searching as usual

notifications.title: Rewards Assistant
notifications.content: Rewards Assistant is an extension that automatically searches on Bing.com and earns you points for Rewards.

notifications.title: Rewards Assistant
notifications.content: Rewards Assistant is a free and fun way to reward yourself and make a difference.
